title: New: Andrea – Places (ft. Rejjie Snow)
content:
After the release of Rejjie Snow’s track/video, Lost in Empathy, the world was sold on the work of Mr.

Snow. What we were lacking however was a wealth of material. This is set to change. This guest spot on Parisian producer Andrea’s new EP, Cruising, sees him at his most lyrically proficient. The beat, clearly a xxyyxx rework fails to pack a complete punch, but with Rejjie’s flows of consciousness really coming into their own, the track manages not to suffer.

p.s We have a Rejjie Snow announcement coming soon that will forcibly flip your shit.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
